dada installation

```{r dada}
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("dada2")
```



```{r}
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("phyloseq")
```

```{r}
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "digest"))
```
```{r}
library(dada2)
library(phyloseq)
library(tidyverse)
library(digest)

```
